snippet.title: Dellapina checks in from Chicago
snippet.description: of the Flip Video device, which is completely idiot proof (insert joke here). More to come. Day 3 - 1:30PM I just cheated on barbecue with Mexican. Dan Craig made me do it after the BBQ joint that GPS recommended (Big Ed's Pig and Pit) was shuttered. Day 3 - 12:30PM Dan and I are headed to The Weather Channel to drop off some b-roll. Its conceivable that Dan knows everyone in hockey. I think every...
